revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #23 Qualot |image = [[File:Qualot.png]] |caption = Even in places of constant rain and high humidity, this Berry's plant grows healthy and strong. |growtime = 1h 20m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 20% |points = 550 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Qualot''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 10, but no more than 15 points of spicy, sweet and sour and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Cheri]], [[Pecha]] and [[Aspear]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 50 secs || 16 mins 40 secs || 41 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 20 mins - 2 hours 40 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 35 mins 33 secs -
1 hour 11 mins 6 secs || 8 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Qualot_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following ways to obtain Qualot berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]

Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | colspan=4|'''''OR''''' |- | [[Mago]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pinap]] || 4 mins until ripe || 2 mins 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |} ==Uses== ===Mutations=== Qualot berries can be used to mutate the following berries. {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- !
